evidence.claim: Noor Home Care utilizes AWS for cloud services to enhance scalability and security.
Their adherence to HIPAA regulations indicates handling of sensitive health data.
The company references FHIR standards, suggesting interoperability with other health IT systems.
Mention of X12 EDI transaction sets for billing and claims processing found within documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction usage found.
